comment: * This class is used to specify meta information of a spell checker.

variables.name: mSettingsActivityName
variables.comment:
* The spell checker setting activity's name, used by the system settings to
     * launch the setting activity.

variables.name: CREATOR
variables.comment: * Used to make this class parcelable.

methods.name: public String getId()
methods.comment:
* Return a unique ID for this spell checker.  The ID is generated from
     * the package and class name implementing the method.

methods.name: public ComponentName getComponent()
methods.comment: * Return the component of the service that implements.

methods.name: public String getPackageName()
methods.comment: * Return the .apk package that implements this.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)
methods.comment:
* Used to package this object into a {@link Parcel}.
     *
     * @param dest The {@link Parcel} to be written.
     * @param flags The flags used for parceling.

methods.name: public CharSequence loadLabel(PackageManager pm)
methods.comment:
* Load the user-displayed label for this spell checker.
     *
     * @param pm Supply a PackageManager used to load the spell checker's resources.

methods.name: public Drawable loadIcon(PackageManager pm)
methods.comment:
* Load the user-displayed icon for this spell checker.
     *
     * @param pm Supply a PackageManager used to load the spell checker's resources.

methods.name: public ServiceInfo getServiceInfo()
methods.comment:
* Return the raw information about the Service implementing this
     * spell checker.  Do not modify the returned object.

methods.name: public String getSettingsActivity()
methods.comment:
* Return the class name of an activity that provides a settings UI. * You can launch this activity be starting it with * an {@link android.content.Intent} whose action is MAIN and with an * explicit {@link android.content.ComponentName} * composed of {@link #getPackageName} and the class name returned here. * *

A null will be returned if there is no settings activity.

methods.name: public int getSubtypeCount()
methods.comment: * Return the count of the subtypes.

methods.name: public SpellCheckerSubtype getSubtypeAt(int index)
methods.comment:
* Return the subtype at the specified index.
     *
     * @param index the index of the subtype to return.

methods.name: public int describeContents()
methods.comment: * Used to make this class parcelable.

methods.name: public void dump(final PrintWriter pw, final String prefix)

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)
public void dump(final PrintWriter pw, final String prefix)
